channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom On-Premise Meeting Connector MMR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom On-Premise Meeting Connector MMR

item.title: CVE-2022-28758|2024-09-17T00:16:32.793Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20on-premise%20meeting%20connector%20mmr
item.description: Zoom On-Premise Meeting Connector MMR before version 4.8.20220815.130 contains an improper access control vulnerability. As a result, a malicious actor could obtain the audio and video feed of a meeting they were not authorized to join and cause other meeting disruptions.

item.title: CVE-2022-28761|2024-09-17T01:26:13.252Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20on-premise%20meeting%20connector%20mmr
item.description: Zoom On-Premise Meeting Connector MMR before version 4.8.20220916.131 contains an improper access control vulnerability. As a result, a malicious actor in a meeting or webinar they are authorized to join could prevent participants from receiving audio and video causing meeting disruptions.
